card.name: Venser, the Sojourner
card.property: +2: Exile target permanent you own. Return it to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step. −1: Creatures can't be blocked this turn. −8: You get an emblem with "Whenever you cast a spell, exile target permanent."

card.name: Whitemane Lion
card.property: Flash When this creature enters, return a creature you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Augury Owl
card.property: Flying When this creature enters, scry 3. (Look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom and the rest on top in any order.)

card.name: Coral Fighters
card.property: Whenever this creature attacks and isn't blocked, look at the top card of defending player's library. You may put that card on the bottom of that player's library.

card.name: Minamo Sightbender
card.property: {X}, {T}: Target creature with power X or less can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Mistmeadow Witch
Scroll Thief
card.property: Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

card.name: Neurok Invisimancer
card.property: This creature can't be blocked. When this creature enters, target creature can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Slith Strider
card.property: Whenever this creature becomes blocked, draw a card. Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Sky Spirit
card.property: Flying, first strike

card.name: Wall of Denial
card.property: Defender, flying Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

card.name: Galepowder Mage
card.property: Flying Whenever this creature attacks, exile another target creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Kor Cartographer
card.property: When this creature enters, you may search your library for a Plains card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Clone
card.property: You may have this creature enter as a copy of any creature on the battlefield.

card.name: Cryptic Annelid
card.property: When this creature enters, scry 1, then scry 2, then scry 3. (To scry X, look at the top X cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom and the rest on top in any order.)

card.name: Primal Plasma
card.property: As this creature enters, it becomes your choice of a 3/3 creature, a 2/2 creature with flying, or a 1/6 creature with defender.

card.name: Sawtooth Loon
card.property: Flying When this creature enters, return a white or blue creature you control to its owner's hand. When this creature enters, draw two cards, then put two cards from your hand on the bottom of your library.

card.name: Cache Raiders
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, return a permanent you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Windreaver
card.property: Flying {W}: This creature gains vigilance until end of turn. {W}: This creature gets +0/+1 until end of turn. {U}: Switch this creature's power and toughness until end of turn. {U}: Return this creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Jedit's Dragoons
card.property: Vigilance When this creature enters, you gain 4 life.

card.name: Sunblast Angel
card.property: Flying When this creature enters, destroy all tapped creatures.

card.name: Sphinx of Uthuun
card.property: Flying When this creature enters, reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

card.name: Path to Exile
card.property: Exile target creature. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Preordain
card.property: Scry 2, then draw a card. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom and the rest on top in any order.)

card.name: Sigil of Sleep
card.property: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to a player, return target creature that player controls to its owner's hand.

card.name: Revoke Existence
card.property: Exile target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Angelic Shield
card.property: Creatures you control get +0/+1. Sacrifice this enchantment: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Oblivion Ring
card.property: When this enchantment enters, exile another target nonland permanent. When this enchantment leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Safe Passage
card.property: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you and creatures you control this turn.

card.name: Steel of the Godhead
card.property: Enchant creature As long as enchanted creature is white, it gets +1/+1 and has lifelink. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.) As long as enchanted creature is blue, it gets +1/+1 and can't be blocked.

card.name: Vanish into Memory
card.property: Exile target creature. You draw cards equal to that creature's power. At the beginning of your next upkeep, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control. If you do, discard cards equal to that creature's toughness.

card.name: Overrule
card.property: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. You gain X life.

card.name: Azorius Chancery
card.property: This land enters tapped. When this land enters, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {W}{U}.

card.name: Flood Plain
card.property: This land enters tapped. {T}, Sacrifice this land: Search your library for a Plains or Island card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: New Benalia
card.property: This land enters tapped. When this land enters, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.) {T}: Add {W}.

card.name: Sejiri Refuge
card.property: This land enters tapped. When this land enters, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {W} or {U}.

card.name: Soaring Seacliff
card.property: This land enters tapped. When this land enters, target creature gains flying until end of turn. {T}: Add {U}.

card.name: Koth of the Hammer
card.property: +1: Untap target Mountain. It becomes a 4/4 red Elemental creature until end of turn. It's still a land. −2: Add {R} for each Mountain you control. −5: You get an emblem with "Mountains you control have '{T}: This land deals 1 damage to any target.'"

card.name: Plated Geopede
card.property: First strike Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, this creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Pygmy Pyrosaur
card.property: This creature can't block. {R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Pilgrim's Eye
card.property: Flying When this creature enters, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Aether Membrane
card.property: Defender; reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Whenever this creature blocks a creature, return that creature to its owner's hand at end of combat.

card.name: Fiery Hellhound
card.property: {R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Vulshok Sorcerer
card.property: Haste {T}: This creature deals 1 damage to any target.

card.name: Anger
card.property: Haste As long as this card is in your graveyard and you control a Mountain, creatures you control have haste.

card.name: Cosi's Ravager
card.property: Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, you may have this creature deal 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.

card.name: Vulshok Berserker
card.property: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

card.name: Bloodfire Kavu
card.property: {R}, Sacrifice this creature: It deals 2 damage to each creature.

card.name: Stone Giant
card.property: {T}: Target creature you control with toughness less than this creature's power gains flying until end of turn. Destroy that creature at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Geyser Glider
card.property: Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, this creature gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Lithophage
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this creature unless you sacrifice a Mountain.

card.name: Torchling
card.property: {R}: Untap this creature. {R}: Target creature blocks this creature this turn if able. {R}: Change the target of target spell that targets only this creature. {1}: This creature gets +1/-1 until end of turn. {1}: This creature gets -1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Chartooth Cougar
card.property: {R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Mountaincycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Mountain card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

card.name: Earth Servant
card.property: This creature gets +0/+1 for each Mountain you control.

card.name: Greater Stone Spirit
card.property: This creature can't be blocked by creatures with flying. {2}{R}: Until end of turn, target creature gets +0/+2 and gains "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."

card.name: Bloodfire Colossus
card.property: {R}, Sacrifice this creature: It deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.

card.name: Wayfarer's Bauble
card.property: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Armillary Sphere
card.property: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Journeyer's Kite
card.property: {3}, {T}: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Vulshok Morningstar
card.property: Equipped creature gets +2/+2. Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Searing Blaze
card.property: Searing Blaze deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker and 1 damage to target creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls. Landfall — If you had a land enter the battlefield under your control this turn, Searing Blaze deals 3 damage to that player or planeswalker and 3 damage to that creature instead.

card.name: Vulshok Battlegear
card.property: Equipped creature gets +3/+3. Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Downhill Charge
card.property: You may sacrifice a Mountain rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of Mountains you control.

card.name: Seismic Strike
card.property: Seismic Strike deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.

card.name: Spire Barrage
card.property: Spire Barrage deals damage to any target equal to the number of Mountains you control.

card.name: Jaws of Stone
card.property: Jaws of Stone deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of targets, where X is the number of Mountains you control as you cast this spell.

card.name: Volley of Boulders
card.property: Volley of Boulders deals 6 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets. Flashback {R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
